name: InspireSmart
tag_list: software-development, web-development, mobile-app-development, ios-development, iphone-app-development, ipad-app-development
overview:
InspireSmart is a custom software development firm based in Denver, CO.

Since 2004, InspireSmart has worked with various types of businesses to develop custom software solutions that fit their needs. As a Microsoft Certified Partner of over five years, InspireSmart has dedicated a lot of time and energy into enterprise projects.

As of late, however, the company has shifted gears toward mobile application development with an entire iOS development team now in-house. This team works on client projects as well as InspireSmart’s biggest internal project, ConnectBusiness: a web & iPad point of sale app.
